snippet: A computer-generated Tinker Bell, moving sets and a contraption-heavy pirate ship are among the technical hurdles that face NBC in presenting a live “Peter Pan.”
abstract: NBC's three-hour broadcast of Peter Pan Live!, adapted from 1954 Jerome Robbins Broadway play and starring Allison Williams and Christopher Walken, features dozens of complex technical elements intended to dazzle viewers and boost ratings.
lead_paragraph: A computer-generated Tinker Bell, moving sets and a contraption-heavy pirate ship are among the technical hurdles that face NBC in presenting a live “Peter Pan.”

headline.seo: ‘Peter Pan Live!,’ With Allison Williams and Christopher Walken, Comes to NBC
